functions.label: buildKibanaRequestFromAction
description:
Builds a Kibana HTTP request from connector definitions
This is shared between the execution engine and the YAML editor copy functionality
signature: (actionType: string, params: any) => { method: string; path: string; body?: any; query?: any; headers?: any; }

functions.label: buildRequestFromConnector
description:
Builds an Elasticsearch request from connector definitions
This is shared between the execution engine and the YAML editor copy functionality
signature: (stepType: string, params: any) => { method: string; path: string; body?: any; params?: any; }
